name: Cyber Synth
description:
Use the power of rhythm to destroy your enemies!

In Cyber Synth, you shoot in time with the beats! Survive for 20 seconds, beat the 20 enemies, and you win the level! Play along with a few songs, ranging from tropical, to electro! Each track has a set difficulty, as displayed by the amount of stars above the song.

This is a game made in GameMaker Studio 2, for the GM20 Game Jam! 

There are a few things in my game that follow the theme:

  • Resolution: 220 x 220
  • Viewport: 720x720
  • Survive for 20 seconds
  • Total 20 enemies each level
  • Tempo for every song: 120bpm

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Ship

Mouse - Aim Ship
